scripts.build: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production --progress --config webpack/server.prod.config.js & node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production --progress --config webpack/client.prod.config.js
scripts.dev: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode development --progress --watch --config webpack/client.dev.config.js & node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode development --progress --config webpack/server.dev.config.js --watch & node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js dist/server.js
